NAME: setWeaponAmmoClip
DESCRIPTION: Set your weapon ammo to the value given.

NAME: getTacticalWeapon
DESCRIPTION: this will return the callers tactical weapon slot

NAME: getLethalWeapon
DESCRIPTION: this will return the callers lethal weapon slot

NAME: playSound
DESCRIPTION: this will play a sound effect

NAME: setMoveSpeedScale
DESCRIPTION: set the players move speed scale
